text: Zero Hour (stylized as ZERØ HØUR) is a 2013 ABC thriller television series created by Paul Scheuring. It stars Anthony Edwards, Carmen Ejogo, Jacinda Barrett, Addison Timlin and Scott Michael Foster. It ran from 14 February 2013 to 3 August 2013 for one season and 13 episodes. ==Other websites== * Category:2013 American television series debuts Category:2013 American television series endings Category:ABC network series
title: Zero Hour (2013 TV series)
